roleset.name: able to be imagined
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'imagine'.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Since Iran has been labeled by America as a rogue country , the harm of Iran with nuclear weapons to the world is imaginable .
example.arg: Since Iran has been labeled by America as a rogue country
the harm of Iran with nuclear weapons to the world
